page.title: 05 Employment
page.content: Of the 348 families returning the questionnaire,334 men and 191 women were at work doing a large variety of jobs.14 men were unemployed and 157 of the women were housewives.The 14 men represent about 4% of the men in the sample, which is a surprising rate of unemployment when compared with 15% in Clwyd.It is probable that the 72 families not returning the questionnaire would have raised the rate considerably.67 men and 82 women work within a mile of home.252 men and 104 women travel distances varying between a few miles and 40 miles.11 men and 5 women are lorry drivers,some travelling ll over Britain,3 men work abroad and 1 man travels all over the world as an officer in the Merchant Navy.
